alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 02 at 3:07PM MDT until November 04 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT MDT THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Feet County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to midnight MDT Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft
